name: PaisleyChan - A 4chan Userstyle for Firefox 4
description:
Change the way the 4chan image board pages are laid out, for a more modern/optimized experience.
Required: 
Firefox 4.0 (may work in other browsers, but untested and unsupported)
Greasemonkey scripts: 4chan X, /b/ackwash reloaded
additional_info:
Check out this css on Github: https://github.com/disappoint/PaisleyChan

Thanks to Zixaphir for his "Sliding, Floating Postbox" CSS and for being an all-around cool guy.
